body_html: I'm not concerned about the naming itself, and I'll leave the final decision up to you. I think changing the names in a consistent way isn't terrible, especially that it requires you to describe your intent more explicitly and we can keep the names similar. I'm worried that if it's easy enough to miss for developers of torch.distributions, then some users will trip over it for sure.

body: I'm not concerned about the naming itself, and I'll leave the final decision up to you. I think changing the names in a consistent way isn't terrible, especially that it requires you to describe your intent more explicitly and we can keep the names similar. I'm worried that if it's easy enough to miss for developers of `torch.distributions`, then some users will trip over it for sure.
